name: part_010
file: tmp_【#ノエルのリリカルLIVE 】新たな団長を見てッ !【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [8DQWjvFBma4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel performs the song 'Sirius' on stage during her 3D Live.
MC section where Shirogane Noel thanks the audience and announces new merchandise.

subtitles.original: 誓いが光になって
subtitles.english: My vow turns into light

subtitles.original: いつか君に届く
subtitles.english: And will someday reach you

subtitles.original: その瞬間まで
subtitles.english: Until that very moment

subtitles.original: 泣いてる暇なんてないから
subtitles.english: I have no time to be crying

subtitles.original: はみ出してしまった熱い想いが夜空で
subtitles.english: My overflowing passion

subtitles.original: 輝き出す
subtitles.english: Starts to shine in the night sky

subtitles.original: 生まれてきた意味が分かった気がした
subtitles.english: I feel like I've understood the meaning of my life

subtitles.original: 願い事は全部この手で叶える
subtitles.english: I'll grant all my wishes with these hands

subtitles.original: 不安に抗うだけで精一杯で
subtitles.english: Just fighting off my anxiety took all I had

subtitles.original: 震えてしまっていた昨日があったけど
subtitles.english: There were days when I was trembling yesterday

subtitles.original: 立ち止まってたそんな時間も
subtitles.english: Even those times when I was standing still

subtitles.original: 必要だったのかななんて今はね思える
subtitles.english: Now I can feel like they were necessary

subtitles.original: 暗闇を切り裂き辿り着いた
subtitles.english: Cutting through the darkness, I reached it

subtitles.original: 景色のその向こうに
subtitles.english: Beyond the scenery

subtitles.original: いつも君がちゃんと待っててくれてた
subtitles.english: You were always waiting for me right there

subtitles.original: 愛おしく煌めく世界で
subtitles.english: In this precious and sparkling world

subtitles.original: 流星群追い越し
subtitles.english: Passing the meteor shower

subtitles.original: 高く高く心が叫ぶ先へ
subtitles.english: High and higher, to where my heart screams

subtitles.original: もらっている以上にあげられるように
subtitles.english: So I can give back even more than I receive

subtitles.original: ねえ未来は全部この手で叶える
subtitles.english: Hey, I'll grant the entire future with these hands

subtitles.original: 痛く抱えていた夜も
subtitles.english: Nights I held onto the pain

subtitles.original: 涙で迎えた朝もどんな時も
subtitles.english: Mornings I met with tears, through it all

subtitles.original: 眩い青星みたいに
subtitles.english: Like a dazzling blue star

subtitles.original: 突き上げたこの手に握り締めた
subtitles.english: Holding tight in my raised hands

subtitles.original: 誓いが光になって
subtitles.english: My vow turns into light

subtitles.original: いつか君に届くその瞬間まで
subtitles.english: Until that very moment it reaches you

subtitles.original: 泣いてる暇なんてないから
subtitles.english: I have no time to be crying

subtitles.original: はみ出してしまった熱い想いが夜空で
subtitles.english: My overflowing passion

subtitles.original: 輝き出す
subtitles.english: Starts to shine in the night sky

subtitles.original: 生まれてきた意味が分かった気がした
subtitles.english: I feel like I've understood the meaning of my life

subtitles.original: 願い事は全部この手で叶える
subtitles.english: I'll grant all my wishes with these hands

subtitles.original: そう未来は全部この手で叶える
subtitles.english: Yes, I'll grant the entire future with these hands

subtitles.original: はい！はい、どうでしたか？
subtitles.english: Alright! Well, how was that?

subtitles.original: 団長の「シリウス」でした！
subtitles.english: That was your Knight Leader's 'Sirius'!

subtitles.original: いや、これはね、ちょっと匂わせてたの、気づいたかな？
subtitles.english: I was hinting at this a little, did you notice?

subtitles.original: 団長、最近の歌枠とかで、ちょっと練習してたので
subtitles.english: I've been practicing it in recent singing streams

subtitles.original: いや、もしかしたらライブこれ歌うんじゃないかなって
subtitles.english: I think some people might have thought,

subtitles.original: 思ってた人もいると思うんですけど、その人は正解です！
subtitles.english: 'Maybe she'll sing this at the live' - and you were right!

subtitles.original: っていう感じで、いや本当に、あの、ライブもだんだんと終盤に...
subtitles.english: And so, really, the live is gradually nearing the end...

subtitles.original: 終盤どころか、もうあと一曲...いや、まだまだ！
subtitles.english: Actually, past the end, there's only one song left... Wait, not yet!

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、ここで、「え、もう一曲なら、ちょっといいか」と思って
subtitles.english: Right now, if you're thinking, 'Eh, only one song left, I'm good,'

subtitles.original: ブラウザバックしようとしたそこの君！なんと重大告知が、
subtitles.english: and trying to click back! Well, I have a major announcement...

subtitles.original: ドゥルルルルルル...ジャン！二つ、あります！
subtitles.english: Drumroll please... Ta-da! I have two of them!

subtitles.original: いや、一つはね、たぶん想像つくと思うんですけど...
subtitles.english: I think you can probably guess one of them, but...

subtitles.original: まあ、まずは、ちょっと一つ目から発表したいと思います！
subtitles.english: Well, first, I'd like to announce the first one!

subtitles.original: なんだろうな？ドゥー...ドン！
subtitles.english: What could it be? Drumroll... Bang!

subtitles.original: 白銀ノエル、3D新衣装記念2022グッズが発売されます！
subtitles.english: Shirogane Noel's 3D New Costume Celebration 2022 merchandise is now on sale!

subtitles.original: ドンドンパフパフパフパフ！
subtitles.english: *Celebratory noises*

subtitles.original: ということでね、まあ詳細の方、ちょっと話していくとですね
subtitles.english: So, to go into the details a bit...

subtitles.original: あの、今回、まあ、こうやって新衣装になりました。
subtitles.english: This time, well, I've got this new costume.

subtitles.original: そう、100万人記念の衣装が、こうやって運営さんに、はい、いただいて...
subtitles.english: Yes, I received this 100-million subscriber celebration outfit from management...
